topic.title: Death Report Document Body - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code to indicate this is the section containing death reporting information.

Contains zero or one [0..1] text
Contains, as text entries that can be rendered using a browser, the content of the structured information from the entries within the section.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Time of Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.13)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
The report is expected to capture information about the physical location of death, either as an address or as a description.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Location of Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.10)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Death Certification (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.7)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Manner of Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.11)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pregnancy Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.12)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Tobacco Use (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.14)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.9)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Death Causal Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.6)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Autopsy Performance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.2)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Autopsy Results (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.3)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Coroner Referral (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.5)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Coroner Case Transfer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.4)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Death Location Type (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.8)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code to indicate this is the section containing death reporting information.

Contains zero or one [0..1] text
Contains, as text entries that can be rendered using a browser, the content of the structured information from the entries within the section.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Time of Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.13)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Location of Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.10)
The report is expected to capture information about the physical location of death, either as an address or as a description.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Death Certification (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.7)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Manner of Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.11)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pregnancy Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.12)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Tobacco Use (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.14)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.9)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Death Causal Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.6)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Autopsy Performance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.2)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Autopsy Results (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.3)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Coroner Referral (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.5)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Coroner Case Transfer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.4)
